member.name: M:EH.PCPS.TestAutomation.FdiReferenceHost.CommonFlows.GetDtmContainerPath.Run
member.summary: Provides the host application specific DTM container Ranorex path. To work with the actual device functions in this framework, the path needs to include the container "ControlAXSourcingSite" for Device Care and the container "GuiTransparentProxy" for FieldCare.

member.name: F:EH.PCPS.TestAutomation.FdiReferenceHost.Functions.ApplicationArea.MainView.Execution.GetDtmContainerPath.dtmContainerRepository
member.summary: Create an instance of the repository which will be used

member.name: M:EH.PCPS.TestAutomation.FdiReferenceHost.Functions.ApplicationArea.MainView.Execution.GetDtmContainerPath.GetMDIClientPath
member.summary: Gets the path of the DTM Container(mdi client) from the DTMContainer repository of the actually used frame
member.returns: string: with the absolute path of the DTM Container null: if an error occurred

member.name: T:EH.PCPS.TestAutomation.FdiReferenceHost.GUI.ApplicationArea.MainView.DtmContainer
member.summary: The class representing the DtmContainer element repository.

member.name: P:EH.PCPS.TestAutomation.FdiReferenceHost.GUI.ApplicationArea.MainView.DtmContainer.Instance
member.summary: Gets the singleton class instance representing the DtmContainer element repository.
